In: Lifestyle › Dining Out
Rate This Answer

Facebook Tweet Email Advertisement About McDonalds
McDonalds is an American fast food company founded in 1940. It has since served over 99 billion people in 119 countries. Signature items on the McDonalds menu include the Big Mac, Chicken McNuggets and the McChicken Sandwich. McDonalds revolutionized the food service industry by making quick, tasty, affordable food and offering a standardized menu that has worldwide appeal
More about McDonalds »
About Macaroni Grill
Romano's Macaroni Grill is an American restaurant chain specializing in 'old Italian Mediterranean' style of cooking. According to their menu, they use"imported artisan pastas, vine-ripened tomatoes, colorful vegetables, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemons, select seafood, grilled meats and fresh and fragrant Italian herbs"to make simple traditional dishes. Macaroni Grill's parent company is Brinker International Restaurant.
More about Macaroni Grill »
About Burger King
Burger King is a global fast food restaurant chain that is headquartered in Florida. Burger King began in Jacksonville, Florida in 1953 as Insta-Burger King. Burger King's signature product is the Whopper.
More about Burger King »
